preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM permission WHERE name = 'MG_MANAGE_INVENTORY' AND parent_id = (SELECT permission_id FROM permission WHERE name = 'MANAGE_GERMPLASM')

changeSet.sql: UPDATE permission SET parent_id = (SELECT p1.permission_id FROM (SELECT permission_id FROM permission WHERE name = 'MANAGE_GERMPLASM') AS p1) WHERE name = 'MG_MANAGE_INVENTORY';
